channel.title: Error
channel.description:
Ok .. I tried adding a menu that appears when you click a certain npc i got 1 error when i added this
} else if (NPCID == 1052) { // Not sure pfft PutNPCCoords = true; Help menu();
The error was this ..
client.java:17028: ";" expected Help menu () ^
But when i added this a ; gave me 2 errors instead of 1
